instructions.step: Heat the oil in a 23cm non-stick, ovenproof frying pan and cook the bacon and onion gently for 7-10 minutes, until softened and golden.
Meanwhile, beat the eggs in a large bowl, then stir in the gnocchi, broccoli pieces and thyme leaves.
Remove the bacon and onions from the pan with a slotted spoon and stir into the egg mixture. Pour the mixture into the pan and cook on the lowest heat, covered, for 12 minutes until almost set.

Preheat the grill to medium and cook the top of the frittata for 4-5 minutes (make sure the pan handle doesn’t get too hot), until golden and cooked all the way through. Slide onto a board and cut into wedges to serve.
